channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
how do i get the max level changed, i got the top # to stay but bottom # keeps changing
got that to stay > 90/110 < but that keeps going up[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 01:53:19 PM[/size][hr].......................[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 02:05:31 PM[/size][hr]n e idea on how to change it? =P

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Yakooza Yakooza
item.description:
@Yakooza wrote:

Ya i know how to change it but whats the 300.0 suppose to mean?

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @guthan38 guthan38
item.description:
@guthan38 wrote:

Open client.java and search for

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
  	points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
  	output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
  	if (output >= exp) {
    return lvl;
  	}
  }
  return 135;
	}

Change all the 135’s to the number you want max level, I’ve gone 200 on my server. Too make it be level 200 for every stat, change all the 135’s to 200, and the 300.0 to 400.0, so it should look like this.

  for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) {
  	points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
  	output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
  	if (output >= exp) {
    return lvl;
  	}
  }
  return 200;
	}

Read full topic
